body_html: @mkalininait not sure if this will still be relevant after Carsten's upcoming PR, but yeah, I think for 3a it would make a lot of sense to have a general notice at the top of the profile page maybe to show that the profile is still missing something — or anywhere where a filled out profile is required to do something? I'm not sure about the difficulty of implementation there. :(
